thread.title: New Arts Center Near Hudson Yards Announces a Splashy First Season

author: Charles Passy
title: New Arts Center Near Hudson Yards Announces a Splashy First Season

organizations.name: new arts center near hudson yards

text:
The Shed is looking to make a statement in its inaugural year.
The $455 million cultural center, which sits adjacent to the Hudson Yards development on Manhattan’s far West Side, is commissioning work from a wide range of prominent artists, officials said Tuesday. The pieces are slated to premiere starting in spring 2019, marking the beginning of the center’s first season.
The...
